tagline: Beacuse no one likes lint. Especially in JavaScript.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
body:
### LintRoller - The better NPM module for linting JavaScript

A completely customizable solution for linting all JavaScript files in your project, using:
  - JSLint
  - JSHint
  - ...and possibly other features soon.
name: LintRoller
